Mindful Practices: Course 2
Introduction to SEL

What SEL Isn't

Now that you know what SEL is, let's look at what it isn't.

  • SEL is not just a behavior management tool
  • SEL is not only for students, it is also for the adults
  • SEL is a process for adults and students, not just a curriculum that you buy

For more information about these misconceptions, take a few minutes to read this article.
